attributes.action: To help RSPCA prevent what happened to the Amersham Horses to other animals in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Something needs to be done after the disgrace with the Amersham Horses,this is a country that has banned Fox Hunting due to cruelty,RSPCA needs more power to remove/investigate animal/s that are clearly in distress and at the same have the right to place an animal in their custody while investigation is going on without a court order !
